(Ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1920 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2009) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nke Philadelphia nke ọrụ ya nyeere aka mee ka ndị na-ese Black American pụta ìhè.

A mụrụ Keene n'ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1920 na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Ọ gàrà Philadelphia Museum School of Art, Tyler School of Art and Architecture, na Académie Julian. Na 1944 Keene lụrụ Laura Mitchell. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Tuskegee Airman n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Keene nwere ike ịmụ na Academie Julian na Paris n'okpuru G.I
Mgbè ọ nọ na Paris, Keene bụ onye guzobere Galerie Huit.

N'afọ 1952, Keene gàrà Haiti ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma kụzie n'okpuru John Hay Whitney fellowship. N'afọ 1954 ọ laghachiri na United States wee malite ịkụzi na Philadelphia College of Art, ébé ọ kụziri ruo n'afọ 1968. Site na 1968 rụo 1985 Keene kụziri na Bucks County Community College.
N'afọ 1966, Keene sere ihe osise na Mahadum HBCU Johnson C
N'afọ 1971, Keene mepụtara ihe enyemaka màkà Fifty Ninth Street Baptist Church na Philadelphia
O nwèrè mmekọrịta afọ iri abụọ na Brandywine Workshop ma bụrụ ónyé natara Van Der Zee Award ha na 1990.
Keene nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii Nọvemba, 2009, na Warrington, Pennsylvania.
Ọrụ Keene dị na nchịkọta nke Philadelphia Museum of Art, Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, na James A
E tinyere ọrụ Keene na ngosi 2015 We Speak: Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum.
